GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
mctp: Fix an error handling path in mctp_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 49d8a6e24a3496d86e8d8ae748375df984fb6d6f, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 4d8b9319282ae84f5a17b28d8b5b5d1e7e537312. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mctp: Fix an error handling path in mctp_init()
